forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: board/ forum linking

comments.text: you can create different types of links in comments, by using square brackets.
this is a link to teleport to an area: [buildtown]. (you can also write [area: buildtown])
this links to an in-forum search (feature in the works): [-> hello]
this links to a board: [board: hangout]
steam image urls can be ctrl+v pasted when typing a comment, and turn to [steamimage: 93851461978378291/3138BB069C23F6B4720F641900E3DBDE3EFB4823/]
imgur image sources (right-click an image there to get the url) too can be pasted: [imgur: vacxHNx.png]
you can also paste youtube urls, which turn to [youtube: 7rOMGIbY-9s]

thread.latestCommentText: you can also paste youtube urls, which turn to [youtube: 7rOMGIbY-9s]
